price: ߊߟߎ߫ ߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߊߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬، ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߏ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߛߋ߫ ߟߊ߫ ߞߏ ߓߍ߯ ߟߊ߫
arabic: إِلَى ٱللَّهِ مَرۡجِعُكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ قَدِيرٌ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: ilā al-lahi marjiʿukum wahuwa ʿalā kulli shayin qadīrun
